text: Gripen Trollhättan BK is a bandy club in Trollhättan, Sweden. The club was formed in 1936. The club was originally called Gripens BK, before changing name in 1988. The men's team played in the Swedish first division the seasons of 1973/1974, 2001/2002, 2002/2003 and 2004/2005. During the 2006/2007 season, the club managed to reach the top division again, where the club played during the 2007/2008. Their home ground is Slättbergshallen. == References == ==Other websites== * official website Category:1936 establishments in Europe Category:Bandy clubs in Sweden Category:Sport in Trollhättan Category:1930s establishments in Sweden
title: Gripen Trollhättan BK
